overview: The video ADUPÉ OBALUAÊ (A Canção is part of the album DO MEU CORAÇÃO NU by the Brazilian pianist, composer and singer Zé Manoel), is about our ancestry.  Obaluaê is the orisha of healing in all its aspects, orisha of the land and protector of health.  It is called whenever necessary to prevent disease.
title: ADUPÉ OBALUAÊ
